players.name: Sarah
players.wound: Abandoned by her family as a child, leading to deep trust issues
players.desire: To find belonging and rebuild connections with others
players.arc: Sarah transforms from a lone wanderer to someone who opens her heart to a chosen family

players.name: Marcus
players.wound: Lost his home in a war, carries guilt for surviving when others didn't
players.desire: To protect others and prevent what happened to him from happening again
players.arc: Marcus learns that true protection comes from empowering others, not controlling them

perspectives.name: Safety vs Vulnerability
perspectives.description: The tension between protecting oneself and opening up to others
perspectives.thematic_question: Can we truly be safe without being vulnerable?

perspectives.name: Belonging vs Freedom
perspectives.description: The balance between connection with others and personal autonomy
perspectives.thematic_question: Must we sacrifice freedom to belong?

storybeats.title: The Abandoned Camp
storybeats.description: Sarah discovers an abandoned camp that reminds her of her childhood. The scattered belongings trigger memories of being left behind. She hesitates to enter, her walls going up.

moments.description: Sarah finds a child's toy among the ruins

storybeats.title: Marcus Extends Trust
storybeats.description: Marcus offers to share his shelter with Sarah during a storm. Despite his protective nature, he gives her space and doesn't ask questions. Sarah cautiously accepts, a small crack in her armor.

moments.description: Marcus leaves extra blankets without saying anything

storybeats.title: The Confession
storybeats.description: Sarah opens up to Marcus about her past, vulnerability flooding through her. She expects judgment but finds only understanding. Marcus shares his own guilt about the war.

moments.description: Sarah's hands shake as she speaks

storybeats.title: Choosing to Stay
storybeats.description: When given the chance to leave alone and travel faster, Sarah chooses to stay with Marcus and the small community they've found. She realizes that true freedom isn't running away from connection.

moments.description: Sarah tears up the map showing the solo route

storypoints.title: Inciting Incident
storypoints.description: Sarah's journey begins when she's forced to choose between staying isolated or seeking help

storypoints.title: First Connection
storypoints.description: The first time Sarah accepts help from another person

storypoints.title: Emotional Climax
storypoints.description: Sarah and Marcus share their deepest wounds

metadata.setting: A devastated world recovering from war
